oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cossitt and the river
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cossitt Library; libraries; Mississippi River; Mud Island; riverboats;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo of a panoramic photograph, showing Cossitt with the river behind it. A riverboat can be seen near the shore.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo, mounted, 10 x 8 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
